name: .TLK File Extension
type_name: BioWare Aurora Engine Talk Table File
summary: Learn about .TLK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Language dialog file used by BioWare first-person shooter games; contains strings of dialog that are displayed during gameplay and allows the game to have multiple localizations for different languages; supported by BioWare's Aurora Engine and Infinity Engine technologies.

content: TLK files are often named dialog.tlk and are located within the game installation directory.
NOTE: Example games that use TLK files are Neverwinter Nights and Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic (KotOR).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
